projects.name: Collision Detection
projects.summary: A simple 2D collision detection project written in JAVA using AABB(axis-aligned bounding boxes) and Separating Axis Theorem (SAT) algorithms. AABB groups robots supporting abstraction of different structures such as `Arm on an Elevator`, and allowing custom translation and rotation to specific stucture

projects.name: Animation on the proof of dot product
projects.summary:
Viedeo introduces the proof of dot product formula using law of cosines, which took me several hours to animate using Manim and Python.
Link to the video: https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV11aW2znEdQ

projects.name: Previous Reverse Engineering Projects
projects.summary: Software that bypass anti-cheat through Virtual Machine and using socket for communication in order to run it in the host machine. See skills section for more technical features. With some of my previous projects are public on Github, the one using socket has been set to private for poor coding style. However, it can be provide if needed.

highlights: a graph based state machine that abstracts robot behaviors into states(angle and height of our arm on Elevator mechanism) as node and allowable transitions as edges

education.score: 5/5 in all 3 subjects. One thing to note is that I started Calculus BC in Januray 2025, completed unit 1 to 6, but stopped until March Break
